trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> is the WPF framework-level implementation and expansion of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> base class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 是 WPF 架構層級實作和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 基底類別的擴充。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> adds support for additional input APIs (including tooltips and context menus), storyboards, data context for data binding, styles support, and logical tree helper APIs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 新增對其他輸入 API (包括工具提示和操作功能表)、腳本、資料繫結程序的資料內容、樣式，以及邏輯樹狀結構協助程式 API 的支援。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> does not yet define its own rendering behavior; instantiating an actual <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> class instance in code or markup is possible but displays nothing in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> 尚未定義自己的轉譯行為。具現化實際<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>中程式碼或標記的類別執行個體可能會但會顯示在中為 nothing[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Rendering logic must be provided by classes that take <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> child elements as part of their content model, or in <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 轉譯邏輯必須採取的類別由提供<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>一部分，其內容的模型，或是在子項目<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> deliberately parallels many of the same [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> 刻意平行設計很多相同[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。

trans-unit.source: Note that certain [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] found on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> will not have a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，某些[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上找到<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>不會有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>相等。

trans-unit.source: Several of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] are for functionality such as geometry representation or layout, which are not relevant for a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 有幾個<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]有的功能，例如幾何表示法或版面配置，哪些不相關的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: The majority of existing <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> derived classes will be found in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的現有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>衍生的類別中將可以找到<xref:System.Windows.Documents>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Many of these derived classes implement elements for the flow document model.
trans-unit.target: 許多這些衍生類別實作非固定格式文件模型項的目。

trans-unit.source: Certain derived classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> have some control-like functionality, but are derived from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> such that the control-like elements can still participate in the flow document model.
trans-unit.target: 某些衍生的類別，例如<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>有一些類似的控制項的功能，但衍生自<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>，這類控制項類似的項目仍然可以參與非固定格式文件模型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The child element to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的子項目。

trans-unit.source: Adds the provided element as a child of this element.
trans-unit.target: 加入所提供的項目作為這個項目的子項目。

trans-unit.source: This method can throw an exception if called at a time when the logical tree is being iterated by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以擲回例外狀況，如果呼叫時之邏輯樹狀結構正在反覆執行另一個處理序一次。

trans-unit.source: Most <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> derived classes expose dedicated collections that are responsible for containment (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span.Inlines%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span> class; <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section.Blocks%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> class).
trans-unit.target: 大部分<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>衍生的類別會公開專用的集合負責內含項目 (例如，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span.Inlines%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Span>類別;<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section.Blocks%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section>類別)。

trans-unit.source: You can typically avoid any need to manipulate the logical tree directly if you derive from these classes instead.
trans-unit.target: 您通常可以避免不需要直接操作之邏輯樹狀結構，如果您改為衍生自這些類別。

trans-unit.source: Working with the logical tree for content elements is an advanced scenario that may require a specialized parser or a specialized <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> that acts as the parent rendering element (content host).
trans-unit.target: 使用內容項目的邏輯樹狀結構是進階的案例可能需要特殊的剖析器或特殊<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，可做為父轉譯項目 （內容主機）。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.LogicalChildren%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>，請參閱[中 WPF 樹狀架構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: Called before an element is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 已在初始化項目之前呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to provide special handling that should occur before your element is initialized during the element loading process.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法以提供您的項目初始化期間載入處理序的項目之前，應該會發生的特殊處理。

trans-unit.source: Your implementation should call the base implementation, because the base (default) implementation sets some internal flags to keep track of initialization.
trans-unit.target: 您的實作應該呼叫基底實作，因為基底 （預設值） 實作設定追蹤的初始設定部分內部旗標。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation will throw an exception if <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BeginInit" /> is called more than one time on the same element prior to reaching <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.EndInit" />.
trans-unit.target: 基底實作將會擲回例外狀況，如果<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BeginInit" />之前達到相同的項目上呼叫一次以上<see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.EndInit" />。

trans-unit.source: Begins the sequence of actions that are contained in the provided storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 開始提供之腳本中包含的動作順序。

trans-unit.source: The storyboard to begin.
trans-unit.target: 要開始的腳本。

trans-unit.source: Begins the sequence of actions that are contained in the provided storyboard.
trans-unit.target: 開始提供之腳本中包含的動作順序。

trans-unit.source: For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks associated with the animation are removed as soon as it reaches the "Fill" period.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用簽章`isControllable`，參數，或指定該參數時， `false`，一旦達到"填滿 」 期間，會移除相關聯的動畫時間軸時鐘。

trans-unit.source: Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after being run once.
trans-unit.target: 因此動畫無法重新啟動之後執行一次。

trans-unit.source: Note that controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard be named or accessible as an instance in code.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，控制動畫也需要分鏡腳本是具名或程式碼內的執行個體可存取。

trans-unit.source: The storyboard to begin.
trans-unit.target: 要開始的腳本。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration that describes behavior to use if a property described in the storyboard is already animated.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別的值，其描述若腳本中描述的屬性已顯示動畫時，所要使用的行為。

trans-unit.source: Begins the sequence of actions that are contained in the provided storyboard, with options specified for what should occur if the property is already animated.
trans-unit.target: 使用若屬性已經顯示動畫時應發生之情形的指定選項，開始提供之腳本中包含的動作順序。

trans-unit.source: For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks associated with the animation are removed as soon as it reaches the "Fill" period.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用簽章`isControllable`，參數，或指定該參數時， `false`，一旦達到"填滿 」 期間，會移除相關聯的動畫時間軸時鐘。

trans-unit.source: Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after being run once.
trans-unit.target: 因此動畫無法重新啟動之後執行一次。

trans-unit.source: Note that controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard be named or accessible as an instance in code.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，控制動畫也需要分鏡腳本是具名或程式碼內的執行個體可存取。

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior
trans-unit.target: 使用撰寫 HandoffBehavior

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove the clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: 當您將套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源; 計時系統不會自動移除時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您藉由套用大量時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock:
trans-unit.target: 有數種方式可移除時鐘：

trans-unit.source: To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>動畫物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除特定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>時鐘的清單，從使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not raised if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The storyboard to begin.
trans-unit.target: 要開始的腳本。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration that describes behavior to use if a property described in the storyboard is already animated.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，其描述若腳本中描述的屬性已顯示動畫時，所要使用的行為。

trans-unit.source: Declares whether the animation is controllable (can be paused) after it is started.
trans-unit.target: 宣告在動畫啟動後，是否可以控制 (暫停) 該動畫。

trans-unit.source: Begins the sequence of actions that are contained in the provided storyboard, with specified state for control of the animation after it is started.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制啟動後之動畫的指定狀態，開始提供之腳本中包含的動作順序。

trans-unit.source: For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks associated with the animation are removed as soon as it reaches the "Fill" period.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用簽章`isControllable`，參數，或指定該參數時， `false`，一旦達到"填滿 」 期間，會移除相關聯的動畫時間軸時鐘。

trans-unit.source: Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after being run once.
trans-unit.target: 因此動畫無法重新啟動之後執行一次。

trans-unit.source: Note that controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard be named or accessible as an instance in code.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，控制動畫也需要分鏡腳本是具名或程式碼內的執行個體可存取。

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior
trans-unit.target: 使用撰寫 HandoffBehavior

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: 當您將套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源; 計時系統不會自動移除這些時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您藉由套用大量時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock:
trans-unit.target: 有數種方式可移除時鐘：

trans-unit.source: To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: 若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>動畫物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。

trans-unit.source: This removes all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除特定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>時鐘的清單，從使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not raised if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這主要是在存留期較長的物件才會發生的動畫問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" /> that is used for the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" /> that is used for the element.
trans-unit.target: 用於項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> can be used to validate the values of multiple properties of an object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>可以用來驗證物件的多個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address and then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設應用程式會提示使用者輸入的位址，然後填入型別的物件`Address`，其中具有屬性`Street`， `City`， `ZipCode`，和`Country`，值的使用者提供。

trans-unit.source: The application has a panel that contains four <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> controls, each of which is bound to one of the object’s properties.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式必須包含四個面板<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>控制項，其中每個繫結至其中一個物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> in a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> to validate the `Address` object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>中<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>驗證`Address`物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> can ensure that the zip code is valid for the country of the address.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>可以確保，郵遞區號就是有效的地址的國家/地區。

trans-unit.source: Child elements inherit the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property.
trans-unit.target: 子項目會繼承<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>從其父項目，就如同任何其他可繼承的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to bring this element into view, within any scrollable regions it is contained within.
trans-unit.target: 在內含此項目的任何可捲動區域內，嘗試將此項目帶入檢視。

trans-unit.source: By calling this method, you effectively will call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.MakeVisible%2A> on any parent scrollable area that contains the element (the parent may very well be a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, not a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>).
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫這個方法，您實際上會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollContentPresenter.MakeVisible%2A>上任何父可捲動區域包含的項目 (父系很可能是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>，而非<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>)。

trans-unit.source: If this element is not contained in a scrollable area, the event is still raised, but there will be no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目不包含在可捲動區域，仍然會引發事件，但會有任何作用。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內容功能表項目，該項目應該在每當從這個項目內透過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 要求內容功能表時出現。

trans-unit.source: The context menu that this element uses.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目使用的內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before any context menu on the element is closed.
trans-unit.target: 在項目上的任何內容功能表正要關閉之前發生。

trans-unit.source: To suppress closing context menus, handlers of the event should mark it as handled.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏關閉內容功能表的 事件處理常式應將其標記為已處理。

trans-unit.source: To use this event as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style, you must reference the underlying service event identifier:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此事件為<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>在樣式中，您必須參考的基礎服務的事件識別項：

trans-unit.source: (This usage is required because the event implementation on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> that exposes the underlying service event does not correctly map the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuClosing> identifier for use in triggers).
trans-unit.target: (這種用法是必要的因為上的事件實作<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>，會公開基礎的服務事件不會正確對應<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuClosing>觸發程序中使用的識別項)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuClosing" /> [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuClosing" /> [路由事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Event identifier objects are created when routed events are registered (see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>) and can then be used to add class handlers (see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由的事件時，會建立事件的識別項物件 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>)，然後可以用來加入類別處理常式 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: Identifier objects contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 識別項物件包含的識別名稱、 擁有者類型、 處理常式類型、 路由策略和公用程式方法新增擁有者的事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any context menu on the element is opened.
trans-unit.target: 當項目上的任何內容功能表開啟時發生。

trans-unit.source: To manually open context menus, handlers of the events should mark the relevant event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 若要手動開啟內容功能表，為已處理的事件處理常式時，應該標記相關的事件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the existing value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A> property will be used to automatically open a context menu.
trans-unit.target: 否則，現有的值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A>屬性會用來自動開啟內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: Marking the event handled will effectively cancel the default action, and could be an opportunity to reset the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A> property and then open the new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 標記處理事件會有效地取消的預設動作，並可能會重設的值有機會<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A>屬性，然後開啟 新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>。

trans-unit.source: However, there is a timing issue you should be aware of.
trans-unit.target: 不過，是您應該注意的時間問題。

trans-unit.source: In order to completely replace the context menu through a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuOpening> handler, the initial context menu must not be null / empty.
trans-unit.target: 為了完全取代透過內容功能表<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuOpening>處理常式中，初始的內容功能表必須不是 null 或空白。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you might need to handle the event and then manually open a new context menu.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可能需要處理事件，並手動開啟新的內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [How to: Handle the ContextMenuOpening Event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 處理 ContextMenuOpening 事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md)。

trans-unit.source: To use this event as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style, you must reference the underlying service event identifier:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此事件為<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>在樣式中，您必須參考的基礎服務的事件識別項：

trans-unit.source: (This usage is required because the event implementation on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> that exposes the underlying service event does not correctly map the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuOpening> identifier for use in triggers).
trans-unit.target: (這種用法是必要的因為上的事件實作<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>，會公開基礎的服務事件不會正確對應<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuOpening>觸發程序中使用的識別項)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cursor that displays when the mouse pointer is over this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定滑鼠指標在此元素上方時所顯示的游標。

trans-unit.source: The cursor to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的游標。

trans-unit.source: The default value is defined as <see langword="null" /> per this dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值依這個相依性屬性定義為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: However, the practical default at run time will come from a variety of factors.
trans-unit.target: 不過，執行階段的實際預設值會受各種因素影響。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor relies on type conversion for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> class to evaluate the string.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器依賴的型別轉換<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>類別來評估的字串。

trans-unit.source: The provided string should evaluate to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorType> value.
trans-unit.target: 提供的字串應評估為<xref:System.Windows.Input.CursorType>值。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> for details.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>。

trans-unit.source: Whether the cursor as established by this property will or will not display when the mouse pointer is over this element is also dependent on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ForceCursor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所建立的資料指標將還是不會顯示當滑鼠指標位在這個項目也是取決於值的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ForceCursor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Also, event-related considerations such as an active drag, mouse capture, text editing modes within controls, and so on, will also affect the cursor with higher priority than the value you specify in this property.
trans-unit.target: 此外，事件相關的考量，例如使用中拖曳滑鼠擷取、 文字編輯模式中的控制項，並依此類推，也會影響資料指標具有較高的優先順序比您指定這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: To revert the behavior of setting this property to the eventual default, set it to `null` again.
trans-unit.target: 若要還原的此屬性設定為最終的預設行為，將它設定為`null`一次。

trans-unit.source: The `null` default really means that determination of the practical cursor value is deferred here and should be obtained from elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: `null`預設真的表示實際的資料指標的值判斷此處延後，應該從別處取得。

trans-unit.source: If presented with no programmatic values from any source, the default cursor over a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application will be an arrow.
trans-unit.target: 如果透過任何程式設計的值，從任何來源，預設資料指標不看到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式將會箭號。

trans-unit.source: Each movement of the mouse over a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application raises a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor> event.
trans-unit.target: 每次移動滑鼠停留[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式引發<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event bubbles, and any element along the route has the opportunity to handle the event and to set the value of the cursor via the arguments of this event.
trans-unit.target: 事件反昇，且此路由上的任何項目都有機會處理事件，並設定透過此事件的引數的資料指標的值。

trans-unit.source: If that happens, the fact that the event is handled and has a changed value in the arguments takes precedence over the value of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Cursor%2A> property at any level, unless <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ForceCursor%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生這種情況，事件處理，而且引數中已變更的值優先順序高於值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Cursor%2A>屬性在任何層級，除非<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ForceCursor%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: If not creating a custom cursor, typically you set this property to a static property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果未建立自訂游標，通常您設定此屬性的靜態屬性值<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursors>類別。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor> to a custom value is not enabled in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>自訂值中未啟用部分信任。

trans-unit.source: For more information on custom cursors, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關自訂的資料指標的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Cursor" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Cursor" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data context for an element when it participates in data binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目在參與資料繫結時的資料內容。

trans-unit.source: The object to use as data context.
trans-unit.target: 用做為資料內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: *Data context* is a concept that allows elements to inherit information from their parent elements about the binding source that is used for binding, as well as other characteristics of the binding such as the path.
trans-unit.target: *資料內容*是一種概念，可讓項目繼承其父項目，用於繫結，以及其他特性，例如路徑的繫結的繫結來源的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Data context can be set directly to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, with the bindings evaluating to properties of that object.
trans-unit.target: 資料內容設為直接[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]物件，並將該物件的內容來評估的繫結。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can set the data context to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將資料內容設<xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property inherits property values.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性會繼承屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If there are child elements with no other value for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A> established through local values or styles, the property system will set the value to be the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A> value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何其他值作為具有子元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>建立透過本機值或樣式，對屬性系統將會設定為值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>指派此值與最接近的父項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use one of the following properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> class to specify the binding source explicitly: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用的下列屬性的其中一個<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>類別來明確指定繫結來源： <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ElementName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Source%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 指定的繫結來源](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md)。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A> is most commonly set to as a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> declaration.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>最常當做設<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>宣告。

trans-unit.source: You can use either property element syntax or attribute syntax.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用屬性項目語法或屬性語法。

trans-unit.source: Attribute syntax is shown in the example on this page.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，此頁面上顯示屬性語法。

trans-unit.source: You can also set <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A> in code.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>程式碼中。

trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: *dataContextObject*
trans-unit.target: *dataContextObject*

trans-unit.source: A directly embedded object that serves as data context for any bindings within the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 直接內嵌的物件做為父項目中的任何繫結的資料內容。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this object is a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or another <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase> subclass.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這個物件是<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>或另一個<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>子類別。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, raw data of any [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] object type intended for binding may be placed here, with the actual bindings defined later.
trans-unit.target: 或者，任何未經處理資料[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]物件適用於繫結，可能會放在這裡，以實際的繫結稍後所定義的類型。

trans-unit.source: *bindingUsage*
trans-unit.target: *bindingUsage*

trans-unit.source: A binding usage that evaluates to an appropriate data context.
trans-unit.target: 評估為適當的資料內容繫結使用方式。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Binding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Binding 標記延伸模組](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: *resourceExtension*
trans-unit.target: *resourceExtension*

trans-unit.source: One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: This usage is used when referring to raw data defined as an object in resources.
trans-unit.target: 定義為資源中之物件的未經處理資料時，就會使用這種使用方式。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: *contextResourceKey*
trans-unit.target: *contextResourceKey*

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the object being requested from within a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 從所要求之物件的金鑰識別碼<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example sets a binding on a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> element, by creating a new custom data object, establishing that object as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>, and setting the binding path to a property within it.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定繫結上<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>項目，藉由建立新的自訂資料物件，建立該物件做為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>，並將繫結路徑設定為它的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element's data context changes.
trans-unit.target: 當這個項目的資料內容變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of data contexts and data binding, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料內容和資料繫結的說明，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When an element's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A> changes, all data-bound properties on this element are potentially affected.
trans-unit.target: 項目時<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>可能受影響的變更，這個項目上的所有資料繫結屬性。

trans-unit.source: This applies to any elements that are descendant elements of the current element, which inherit the data context, and also the current element itself.
trans-unit.target: 這適用於任何項目之子代項目的目前的項目繼承的資料內容，以及目前的項目本身。

trans-unit.source: All such bindings re-interpret the new <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A> to reflect the new value in bindings.
trans-unit.target: 所有此類繫結重新解譯新<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext%2A>以反映新的值繫結中。

trans-unit.source: There is no guarantee made about the order of these changes relative to the raising of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 進行這些變更，相對於引發的順序不保證<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The changes can occur before the event, after the event, or in any mixture.
trans-unit.target: 事件之後，或以任何混合事件之前發生的變更。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DataContext" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key to use to find the style template for this control in themes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定索引鍵，以用來在佈景主題中尋找這個控制項的樣式樣板。

trans-unit.source: The style key.
trans-unit.target: 樣式索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: To work correctly as part of theme style lookup, this value is expected to be the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the element being styled.
trans-unit.target: 若要正確運做為佈景主題查詢的一部分，這個值必須是要加上樣式之項目的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> is an accepted value for a certain case.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 在某些案例中可接受的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically not set through any of its direct setters.
trans-unit.target: 透過任何其直接 setter 通常未設定此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you override the type-specific metadata of this dependency property every time you create a new subclass.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您會覆寫這個相依性屬性的特定類型的中繼資料每次建立新的子類別。

trans-unit.source: When you subclass, call the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.OverrideMetadata%2A> method against the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DefaultStyleKeyProperty> identifier, within the static constructor of the control subclass.
trans-unit.target: 當您子類別化，此時會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.OverrideMetadata%2A>針對方法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DefaultStyleKeyProperty>控制項子類別的靜態建構函式識別項。

trans-unit.source: For instance, an inline class such as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold> actually has very little implementation beyond overriding the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DefaultStyleKey%2A> metadata in its static constructor, and exposing several instance constructors.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，這類的內嵌類別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold>確實具有超過覆寫很少實作<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DefaultStyleKey%2A>其靜態建構函式，而且已公開數個執行個體建構函式中的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The fact that elements surrounded by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold> tag gain a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Bold%2A> is implemented within the theme style that was referenced by setting the default value of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DefaultStyleKey%2A> to `typeof(Bold)`.
trans-unit.target: 項目，以事實<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Bold>標記改善<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement.FontWeight%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights.Bold%2A>實作內設定的預設值所參考的佈景主題樣式<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DefaultStyleKey%2A>至`typeof(Bold)`。

trans-unit.source: If you want your element or control to deliberately not use theme styles, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OverridesDefaultStyle%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要您的項目或故意不使用佈景主題樣式的控制項，設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OverridesDefaultStyle%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DefaultStyleKey" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.DefaultStyleKey" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Called immediately after an element is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化項目之後立即呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to provide special handling that should occur when your element is initialized during the element loading process.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法以提供您的項目初始化期間載入處理序的項目時應該發生的特殊處理。

trans-unit.source: Your implementation should call the base implementation, because the base (default) implementation sets some internal flags to keep track of initialization.
trans-unit.target: 您的實作應該呼叫基底實作，因為基底 （預設值） 實作設定追蹤的初始設定部分內部旗標。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BeginInit%2A> was previously called, the base implementation will raise the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Initialized> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BeginInit%2A>之前已呼叫過，基底實作將會引發<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Initialized>事件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BeginInit%2A> was not called or it could not be determined whether <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BeginInit%2A> was called, the event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BeginInit%2A>，不會呼叫也不可以是取決於是否<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BeginInit%2A>已呼叫，不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Name of the element to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Finds an element that has the provided identifier name.
trans-unit.target: 尋找具有所提供之識別項名稱的項目。

trans-unit.source: The requested element.
trans-unit.target: 要求的項目。

trans-unit.source: May be <see langword="null" /> if no matching element was found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到相符的項目，則可能為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If this element has child elements, these child elements are all searched recursively for the requested named element.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目具有子項目，這些子項目會遞迴搜尋所有要求的具名項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets a property on an element found by name within a referenced <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> on a page.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會依名稱參考中找到的項目上設定屬性<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>頁面上。

trans-unit.source: Key identifier of the resource to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找之資源的索引鍵識別項。

trans-unit.source: Searches for a resource with the specified key, and will throw an exception if the requested resource is not found.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋具有指定索引鍵的資源，並將於找不到要求的資源時擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The found resource, or <see langword="null" /> if no matching resource was found (but will also throw an exception if <see langword="null" />).
trans-unit.target: 找到的資源，如果找不到相符的資源則為 <see langword="null" /> (若為 <see langword="null" /> 時也會擲回例外狀況)。

trans-unit.source: If you call this method for a key that cannot be found, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您找不到索引鍵呼叫這個方法，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to handle exceptions for this case, you should instead call <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TryFindResource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想處理例外狀況，此情況下的，您應該呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TryFindResource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TryFindResource%2A> returns `null` when no resource is found, and does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.TryFindResource%2A> 傳回`null`當找到，任何資源，並不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the resource is not found on the calling element, the parent tree is searched using the logical tree, in the same way that the tree would be searched if a resource were requested by key at run-time.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫的項目上找不到資源，父樹狀結構會搜尋使用的邏輯樹狀結構，在樹狀結構的相同方式搜尋的若資源所要求在執行階段的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Typically you would immediately cast the return value to the type of the property that you were attempting to set with the returned resource value.
trans-unit.target: 通常您會立即傳回值轉換為您嘗試使用傳回的資源值設定屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: The following example finds a resource as defined in markup and applies it to a certain property of an element in response to a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會尋找標記中所定義的資源並將其套用至特定路由事件的回應中的項目屬性。

trans-unit.source: The requested resource key was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到要求的資源索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="resourceKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="resourceKey" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that enables customization of appearance, effects, or other style characteristics that will apply to this element when it captures keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，這個物件可自訂外觀、效果或其他樣式特性，以在這個項目捕捉到鍵盤焦點時套用至此項目。

trans-unit.source: The desired style to apply on focus.
trans-unit.target: 要在取得焦點時套用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default value as declared in the dependency property is an empty static <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" />.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性中所宣告的預設值是空的靜態 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" />。

trans-unit.source: However, the effective value at run time is often (but not always) a style as supplied by theme support for controls.
trans-unit.target: 不過，執行階段的有效值通常是 (但不一定總是) 佈景主題支援為控制項所提供的樣式。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], styles are almost always defined as a resource, rather than inline as an element, and that resource is usually referenced as a <xref:System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension>.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]、 樣式幾乎都資源，而非內嵌的項目，定義和資源通常是當做參考<xref:System.Windows.StaticResourceExtension>。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property affects visual appearance but does not report so in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個屬性會影響視覺外觀，但不會報告，在中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: This is because the visual appearance change is event-driven and may not apply at all times, and thus should not generally report any visual or layout information in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為視覺外觀變更是事件驅動和在任何時候，可能不適用，因此通常不應報告中繼資料中的任何視覺效果或版面配置資訊。

trans-unit.source: Conceptually, the visual behavior of focus applied to a control should be coherent from element to element.
trans-unit.target: 在概念上，套用至控制項的焦點視覺行為應該保持一致項目。

trans-unit.source: The most sensible way to enforce coherence is to only change the focus visual style if you are composing an entire theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在撰寫整個佈景主題，只變更焦點視覺化樣式為最實用的方式，來強制執行一致性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property on individual styles and not as part of a theme is not the intended usage of this property, because it may lead to a confusing user experience regarding keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 在個別的樣式，而非佈景主題的部分設定這個屬性不是預定的使用方式，這個屬性，因為它可能會造成混淆的使用者經驗，關於鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: If you are intending element-specific behavior that is deliberately not coherent across a theme, a much better approach is to use triggers in styles for individual input state properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>, and to do so in a way that does not visually interfere with any existing focus visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算是刻意不一致的佈景主題的項目特定行為，更好的方法是使用觸發程序在樣式為個別的輸入的狀態的屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsFocused%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>，以及若要這樣做並不會以方式以視覺化方式會影響任何現有的焦點視覺化樣式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the design intention of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.FocusVisualStyle%2A> and alternative focus properties, see [Styling for Focus in Controls, and FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關的設計目的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.FocusVisualStyle%2A>及替代專注屬性，請參閱[樣式的焦點在控制項和 FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md)。

trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.FocusVisualStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.FocusVisualStyle" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> should force the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] to render the cursor as declared by this instance's <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Cursor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 是否應強制[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 呈現游標，如這個執行個體的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Cursor" /> 屬性所宣告。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to force cursor presentation while over this element to use this instance's setting for the cursor (including on all child elements); otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在游標位於此項目上方時，強制游標展示使用此執行個體的游標設定 (包括在所有子項目上) 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` will override the cursor preferences established by child elements.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`true`將會覆寫的子項目所建立的資料指標喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: Doing so in general application [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] might be confusing for the user, particularly if child elements are attempting to specify cursors.
trans-unit.target: 這樣做，一般應用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]可能會造成混淆的使用者，特別是如果子元素嘗試以指定資料指標。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor%2A> is more appropriate in control subclassing or compositing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ForceCursor%2A>中控制項的子類別化或複合 （compositing） 的情況下更適當。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example forces the cursor while over the element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會強制資料指標在元素上方。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ForceCursor" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ForceCursor" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The target <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> from which to get the binding.
trans-unit.target: 要取得繫結的目標 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> for the specified property's binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定屬性之繫結的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> if the target is data bound; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標已資料繫結則傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />，否則傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves a binding by querying a property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會擷取藉由查詢屬性的繫結。

trans-unit.source: Returns an alternative logical parent for this element if there is no visual parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有視覺父代，則傳回這個項目的替代邏輯父代。

trans-unit.source: In this case, a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> parent is always the same value as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 在這個情況下，<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 父代一律會與 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Parent" /> 屬性的值相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns something other than <see langword="null" /> whenever a WPF framework-level implementation of this method has a non-visual parent connection.
trans-unit.target: 每當這個方法的 WPF 架構層級實作具有非視覺父連線時，傳回 <see langword="null" /> 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns the expected single visual parent.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回預期的單一視覺父代。

trans-unit.source: Custom implementations might return alternate parent relationships.
trans-unit.target: 自訂實作可能會傳回替代的父代關聯性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 當這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 初始化時發生。

trans-unit.source: This coincides with cases where the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsInitialized" /> property changes from <see langword="false" /> (or undefined) to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 這符合 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsInitialized" /> 屬性值從 <see langword="false" /> (或未定義) 變更為 <see langword="true" /> 的案例。

trans-unit.source: This event will be raised whenever the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.EndInit%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnInitialized%2A> methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 此事件將在每次引發<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.EndInit%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.OnInitialized%2A>呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Calls to these methods could have been made by deliberate code, or by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] loading process.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法無法呼叫由審慎的程式碼，或藉由[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]載入程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the context for input used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 所用的輸入內容。

trans-unit.source: The input scope, which modifies how input from alternative input methods is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 輸入範圍，可修改替代輸入法之輸入的解譯方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" /> (which results in a default handling of commands).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" /> (這會導致命令的預設處理)。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property inherits property values.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性會繼承屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If there are child elements with no other value for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A> established through local values or styles, the property system will set the value to be the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A> value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何其他值作為具有子元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>建立透過本機值或樣式，對屬性系統將會設定為值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.InputScope%2A>指派此值與最接近的父項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Although a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax usage is listed and is syntactically allowed, setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is not common.
trans-unit.target: 雖然[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法使用量列為和語法上允許中, 設定這個屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]並不常見。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.InputScope" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.InputScope" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this element has been initialized, either by being loaded as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], or by explicitly having its <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.EndInit" /> method called.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示此項目是否已初始化，初始化方式可能是當做[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 載入，或明確地呼叫其 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.EndInit" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is initialized per the aforementioned loading or method calls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目已根據先前提到的載入或方法呼叫來初始化則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property may also be `true` if this element has been moved within the element tree such that it has a new parent element, and therefore becomes reloaded again.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可能`true`如果這個項目已移動項目樹狀目錄中如有新的父項目，並因此變成一次重新載入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this element has been loaded for presentation.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示此項目是否已載入以供展示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current element is attached to an element tree and has been rendered; <see langword="false" /> if the element has never been attached to a loaded element tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前項目是附加至項目樹狀結構並已呈現則為 <see langword="true" />，如果項目從未附加至已載入的項目樹狀結構則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: From a newly constructed instance, this property starts off `false`, and remains `true` once it is set to `true`, even if subsequently removed by code.
trans-unit.target: 新建構的執行個體中，這個屬性一開始`false`，且會維持`true`一旦設為`true`，即使後續程式碼中移除。

trans-unit.source: The following example code uses <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsLoaded%2A> as a conditional check to assure that a function `displayData` (not shown) will have valid elements loaded on the page to work against, as part of an on-demand handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例程式碼使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.IsLoaded%2A>條件檢查，以確保函式`displayData`（未顯示） 會有有效項目上載入該頁面正常運作，視處理常式的一部分。

trans-unit.source: That same logic is run as an event handler for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded>.
trans-unit.target: 相同的邏輯以事件處理常式執行<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets localization/globalization language information that applies to an individual element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至個別項目的當地語系化/全球化語言資訊。

trans-unit.source: The culture information for this element.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目的文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> instance with its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag" /> value set to the string "en-US".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> 執行個體，且其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag" /> 值設定為 "en-US" 字串。

trans-unit.source: The string formats follow the RFC 3066 standard.
trans-unit.target: 字串格式會依照 RFC 3066 標準。

trans-unit.source: For example, U.S. English is "en-US".
trans-unit.target: 例如，美國英文是"EN-US"。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> for more information on the values and format.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>如需值和格式。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property inherits property values.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性會繼承屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If there are child elements with no other value for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> established through local values or styles, the property system will set the value to be the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A> value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何其他值作為具有子元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>建立透過本機值或樣式，對屬性系統將會設定為值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Language%2A>指派此值與最接近的父項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Language" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Language" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element is laid out, rendered, and ready for interaction.
trans-unit.target: 當項目已配置版面、呈現以及可以互動時發生。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件不會遵循路由，才會處理在引發相同的項目內。

trans-unit.source: Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> in a style.
trans-unit.target: 直接路由的事件並支援其他路由的事件的行為： 它們支援可存取的處理常式集合中，且可用來當作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>樣式。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded" /> [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Loaded" /> [路由事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Event identifier objects are created when routed events are registered (see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>) and can then be used to add class handlers (see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由的事件時，會建立事件的識別項物件 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>)，然後可以用來加入類別處理常式 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: Identifier objects contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 識別項物件包含的識別名稱、 擁有者類型、 處理常式類型、 路由策略和公用程式方法新增擁有者的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the logical child elements of this element.
trans-unit.target: 為此項目的邏輯子項目取得列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for logical child elements of this element.
trans-unit.target: 此項目之邏輯子項目的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to use <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.LogicalChildren%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.AddLogicalChild%2A>，請參閱[中 WPF 樹狀架構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The direction that focus is to be moved, as a value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 要移動焦點的方向，以列舉型別 (Enumeration) 的值表示。

trans-unit.source: Moves the keyboard focus from this element to another element.
trans-unit.target: 將鍵盤焦點從這個項目移至另一個項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if focus is moved successfully; <see langword="false" /> if the target element in direction as specified does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 若成功移動焦點則傳回 <see langword="true" />，若所指定之方向的目標項目不存在則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifying name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目的識別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name provides an instance reference so that programmatic code-behind, such as event handler code, can refer to an element once it is constructed during parsing of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 該名稱會提供執行個體參考，以便程式設計程式碼後置 (Code-Behind)，例如事件處理常式程式碼，在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 的剖析期間被建構後便可參考項目。

trans-unit.source: The name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The most common usage of this property is when specifying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element name in markup.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的最常見的用法時，才能指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]標記中的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property essentially provides a WPF framework-level convenience property to set the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性基本上會提供 WPF 架構層級方便的屬性來設定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [X:name 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。

trans-unit.source: Getting a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> from code is not common, because if you have the appropriate reference in code already, you can just call methods and properties on the element reference and do not generally need the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>從程式碼並不常見，因為如果已經在程式碼中有適當的參考，您可以直接呼叫方法，而且項目上的屬性參考並不這麼做通常需要<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An exception is if the string has some overloaded meaning, for instance if it is useful to display that name in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況是發生在字串中具有某些多載意義，例如是否要顯示在該名稱很有用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Setting a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> from code if the original <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> was set from markup is also not recommended, and changing the property will not change the object reference.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>從程式碼如果原始<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>已從標記設定也不建議使用，並變更屬性並不會變更的物件參考。

trans-unit.source: Such object references are created only when the underlying namescopes are explicitly created during [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] loading.
trans-unit.target: 這類物件的參考會建立期間，會明確地建立基礎名稱範圍時，才[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]載入。

trans-unit.source: You must specifically call <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.RegisterName%2A> to make an effective change on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> property of an already loaded element.
trans-unit.target: 您必須特別呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.RegisterName%2A>有效的變更，以便<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>已經載入的項目屬性。

trans-unit.source: One notable case where setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> from code is important is for naming elements that storyboards will run against.
trans-unit.target: 一個值得注意的大小寫設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>從程式碼，請務必將分鏡腳本的命名項目執行的。

trans-unit.source: Before you can register a name, might also need to instantiate and assign a <xref:System.Windows.NameScope> instance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以註冊之前，可能也需要具現化，並指派<xref:System.Windows.NameScope>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: See the Example section, or [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節中，或[概觀腳本](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> from code has limited applications, but looking up an element by name is more common, particularly if you are employing a navigation model where pages reload into the application and the run-time code is not necessarily the code-behind of that respective page.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>從程式碼受到限制的應用程式，但依名稱查閱項目是較常見，特別是如果您採用頁面會重新載入到應用程式，執行階段程式碼不一定是程式碼後置的瀏覽模型個別頁面。

trans-unit.source: The utility method <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.FindName%2A>, which is available from any <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>, can find any element by <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> in that element's logical tree recursively.
trans-unit.target: 公用程式方法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.FindName%2A>，這是可從任何<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>，可以找到任何元素<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>中項目邏輯樹狀結構以遞迴方式。

trans-unit.source: Or you can use the <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.FindLogicalNode%2A> static method of <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>, which also takes the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A> string as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 或者您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.FindLogicalNode%2A>靜態方法<xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper>，這也會採用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name%2A>做為引數的字串。

trans-unit.source: Commonly used root elements (<xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> for example) implement the interface <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>.
trans-unit.target: 常用根項目 (<xref:System.Windows.Window>，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>例如) 實作的介面<xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this interface are expected to enforce that names be unambiguous within their scope.
trans-unit.target: 此介面的實作應該強制執行的名稱是其範圍內模稜兩可。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.Name" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides data about the event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有關事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuClosing" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuClosing" /> 路由事件到達其路由中的這個類別時，便會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 萬一中繼類別繼承中的已實作此方法，您仍應該呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是有點像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 它會提供方法來處理來自衍生類別的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式的比對事件。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件可能有子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式項目所引發，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須列入的事件引數的來源屬性 （和不應嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route.
trans-unit.target: 子類別<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>無法選擇此路由上收到事件時呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.
trans-unit.target: 一個可能的情況是取用事件的引數，並謹慎地將事件標示為已處理，以縮短路由。

trans-unit.source: Event data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuOpening" /> routed event reaches this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="E:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenuOpening" /> 路由事件到達其路由中的這個類別時，便會叫用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: You should still call base() in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method.
trans-unit.target: 萬一中繼類別繼承中的已實作此方法，您仍應該呼叫 base （）。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是有點像[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 它會提供方法來處理來自衍生類別的類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式的比對事件。

trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases).
trans-unit.target: On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件，因為路由的事件可能已引發由子項目，不一定會叫用處理常式，因此您的實作必須讓事件引數的來源項目帳戶屬性 （和不應嘗試重新引發該事件，在大部分情況下）。
